overview: Cheap Trick, -the ultimate 1970s rocking arena band, in a famous 1978 Bodukan, Tokyo Concert.  It's all here: the classic-rock hair of Robin Zander and Tom Peterson..the strangely straight "business guy" look of the tie-wearing drummer Bun E. Carlos (along with his over the top athletic drumming)... and the sheer virtuosity and comic weirdness of guitarist Rick Nielsen, whose searing guitar lines ad flamboyant physical energy are matched only by his deliberately goofball geek look-presaging punk rock while playing like Jimmy Page.
title: Cheap Trick: Live Tokyo 1978
